summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Chapter 23.32 of the Seattle Municipal Code at page 145 of the Official Land Use Map, to rezone property located at 4551 Martin Luther King Jr Way South from Lowrise 4 Residential-Commercial (L4 R-C) to Neighborhood Commercial 1 with a 40' height limit and a pedestrian overlay (NC1 P 40). (Petition by Gay Westmoreland, C.F. 309071, DPD Project 3008163).
